description: Whitetail Lane II, one of the most sought-after developments in prestigious Westwood Plateau, built by Polygon Homes. This 3 bedroom + den/office, 2Â½ bath townhome offers an open floor plan. Main floor features an oversized south-facing windows, 9-ft ceiling & cozy fireplace in the living room, white refaced kitchen cabinets, spacious south-facing balcony & powder room. Upstairs - 3 bedrooms, with beautiful views from primary & 2 full bathrooms. Below - tandem 2-car garage with additional driveway parking, den/office & fenced south-facing backyard. The Timbers Club amenities include a party room, gym, outdoor pool, hot tub, dry sauna, indoor hockey rink, table tennis, crafts & theatre rooms, guest suite & dog grooming room. Steps to Coquitlam Centre Mall, SkyTrain, Lafarge lake & schools.
